plot: When he meets an outcast from the Fire Nation, Aang is impatient to skip ahead in his training.

Aang meets a master fire bender so he can learn the skill early, but Jeong Jeong doesn't want to teach Aang the skill because he has to master water and earth first before he can learn to fire bend. Roku convinces Jeong Jeong to teach Aang to fire bend, he reluctantly agrees. When Aang tries to show off the skill to Katara, he accidentally burns her hands and Sokka becomes furious at Aang for injuring his sister. Katara heals her hands at the river. Aang realizes he shouldn't master fire and he should focus on learning how to water bend.
